page.title: 07Education_Sutton School
page.content: There has been a school in Sutton since 1844.The present building is over a hundred years old. It is built of brick with a slate roof.It is a very small school. In the past the school has been altered,the toilets used to be outside but they are now inside.The small room we use as a library was added on in 1904. It has a computer and a televison.We have a temporary class room which the infants use(aged 5-7 years).We have 6 rooms including the mobile. We have 3 teachers, one is a part-time -teacher, there is also a secretary, a cleaner and a dinner lady.There are 22 Juniors and 18 Infants. we have a Football-Team which includes all the 2nd, 3rd and 4th year boys.We have a net-ball team of all the Junior girls.
